SEARCH
Package ProjectRegistration

Class ProjectRegistrationController

java.lang.Object
ProjectRegistration.ProjectRegistrationController
public class ProjectRegistrationController extends Object
Controller class for handling logic related to officer registrations for BTO projects. Provides functionality for creating, updating, and validating project registration records.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectRegistrationController

      public ProjectRegistrationController()

  • Method Details

    • canRegisterForProject

      public static boolean canRegisterForProject(String officer_id, String project_id)
      Checks if an officer is eligible to register for a project. Criteria include: not having already applied to the project, not currently handling overlapping active projects, and availability of officer slots.
      Parameters:
      officer_id - the officer's ID
      project_id - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise

    • createProjectRegistration

      public static boolean createProjectRegistration(String project_id, String id)
      Creates a new project registration record with PENDING status.
      Parameters:
      project_id - the ID of the project to register for
      id - the officer's ID
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successfully created, false otherwise

    • getProjectRegistrationByOfficerId

      public static List<ProjectRegistration> getProjectRegistrationByOfficerId(String id)
      Retrieves all registration records for a given officer.
      Parameters:
      id - the officer's ID
      Returns:
      a list of ProjectRegistration instances submitted by the officer

    • getHandledProjectRegistration

      public static List<ProjectRegistration> getHandledProjectRegistration(String id)
      Retrieves all project registration requests submitted for projects created by a given manager.
      Parameters:
      id - the manager's ID
      Returns:
      a list of ProjectRegistration instances related to the manager's projects

    • updateProjectRegistration

      public static boolean updateProjectRegistration(String registerID, RegistrationStatus status)
      Updates the status of a project registration (e.g., from PENDING to APPROVED/REJECTED).
      Parameters:
      registerID - the registration ID
      status - the new RegistrationStatus
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • getProjectRegistrationByID

      public static ProjectRegistration getProjectRegistrationByID(String id)
      Retrieves a project registration by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the registration ID
      Returns:
      the ProjectRegistration object or null if not found

    • hasRegisteredForProject

      public static boolean hasRegisteredForProject(String id, String projectID)
      Checks if an officer has already registered for a specific project with PENDING status.
      Parameters:
      id - the officer's ID
      projectID - the project ID
      Returns:
      true if a PENDING registration exists, false otherwise

    • checkOfficerInActiveProject

      public static boolean checkOfficerInActiveProject(String registerID)
      Checks if the officer associated with a registration is currently assigned to another project whose application close date is in the future (active).
      Parameters:
      registerID - the registration ID
      Returns:
      true if officer is still in an active project, false otherwise
